sentences.english: When the workmen found it was impossible for me to break loose, they cut all the strings that bound me.
sentences.chinese: 工人們看到我跑不掉了，就割斷了一切捆縛我的繩子。

sentences.english: Prisoner, tell me, who was it that bound you?
sentences.chinese: 囚徒，告訴我，是誰將你捆縛？

sentences.english: Calves are easily bound and slaughtered. Never knowing the reason why.
sentences.chinese: 牛兒任人捆縛宰割從來不知原因爲何。

sentences.english: First, the man should sell the possessions that imprison him.
sentences.chinese: 首先，他要變賣一切捆縛他心靈的財物。
